articles.description: - What are the lockdown rules over Christmas?- When will schools go back after Christmas hols?- When can I get the Pfizer vaccine and is it safe?
articles.content:
COVID CASES SEE BIGGEST EVER DAILY RISE WITH 36,804 INFECTIONS
CORONAVIRUS cases in the UK have seen their biggest ever daily rise after 36,804 new positive tests and 691 deaths were announced today… [+592 chars]
